typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PO as string,
		Vendor as string,
		Apple as string,
		Mango as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> fruits
fruits unpivot(output(
		Fruits as string,
		Amount as string
	),
	ungroupBy(PO,
		Vendor),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
Unpivot1 sink(input(
		Deptid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['unpivotFruits.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
